author: Gulf News Report
title: Gulf News headlines | GulfNews.com
text:
Good news i read Gulf news everyday. mir azmat sanjarani balushi 
very nice i like Gulf News i read every day Gulf News Murhaf Jouejati 
Great anchorwoman -- poise, tone, clarity, and substance. PRADEEP BAGGA 16 December 2013 17:10 
NO NEED TO READ ANY OTHER NEWSPAPER OR TO USE INTERNET FOR NEWS,CURRENTAFFAIRS AND WEATHER , ANY OTHER INFORMATION IF FOLLOW GULF NEWS ONLY.THAT'S MY PROMISE... Jacob 16 December 2013 17:10 
I was reading Gulf News from 1992, when i was working in Dubai, andstill reading it now in NewJersey,online edition to get all the news inthe Middle East. Maria 
android apps including this news portion is highly appreciated. KudosGulf news! sandra jane peters 24 November 2013 16:54 
I read Gulf News every day, your posts are always interesting over avaried range of subjects you may ask why i read about your news i simplythink Dubai is astounding now and like this commentator so well spokenevery thing is great !! Gabor 
Well done. Provides detail not available in USA. sudhir 
nice idea but in my view some text in short will complete the news. sameena 16 December 2013 17:11 
I loved the live broadcast!!! fresh breath of air without any dramas well presented keep it up Ramani Rajan 13 November 2013 15:37 
When innovations are nothing new to Gulf News, as has been witnessed by me for the past 25 years of my stay in the UAE, this new idea of presenting the news visually is definitely interesting and more attractive. Those who cannot spend much time reading or want to see visually as to what happened, this news presentation is a welcoming move and I wish Gulf News all the very best in the years / decades to come. Sonia 
Very nice! Very well presented without resorting to big drama. Talat Rashid 13 November 2013 15:38 
Wonderful, I read Gulf news almost every day, now this new look is even better. I bet lots of people are flocking to this your website every day. Good luck and keep up the best tradition of bringing world to us.. GIRISH
